ygData.msgSnippet: buy the two books, basic blacksmithing and  armor and weapons studs become trivial somewhere before skill 42 ... but ... And ... hundred
ygData.messageBody:
buy the two books, basic blacksmithing and armor and weapons

studs become trivial somewhere before skill 42

>From: Rakim2001@...
>

but

>take to become pretty good at making the studs I need for studded armor?
And
>if you could also help me I am wondering what ingredients it takes to make
>those studs?
>
>and once again I am very sorry if you all have heard this questions a
hundred
>times
>
>new smith,
